meanings.definition: A device used to indicate wind direction on a ship.
meanings.sent1: The sailors relied on the dogvanes to know which way the wind was blowing.
meanings.sent2: The captain checked the dogvanes to steer the ship in the right direction.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous seagull perched on the dogvanes, pretending to be a weather vane.
meanings.sent4: The dogvanes danced in the breeze, like colorful flags guiding the ship.
meanings.sent5: The shiny dogvanes gleamed in the sunlight, helping the crew navigate the vast ocean.
